column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place was REALLY busy and REALLY loud limiting conversation to spats of my friend and I screaming at each other.  It's one of those places that's so busy
column2: nobody goes there any more (Yogi Berra).  That and being sat in high traffic convinced us to wrap it up after one drink and find another place.  Shame
column3: because the menu looked pretty good.
